mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST(P_IDX, M_IDX, P_MAIN_CATEGORY, P_SUB_CATEGORY, P_VOTE_TITLE, P_DEADLINE, P_VOTE_1ST, P_VOTE_2ND, P_VOTE_IMG_PATH, P_VOTE_1ST_IMG, P_VOTE_2ND_IMG, P_VOTE_1ST_IMG_ORIGIN, P_VOTE_2ND_IMG_ORIGIN, P_TITLE, P_CONTENT) VALUES(p_idx_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{memIdx}, #{mainCategory}, #{subCategory}, #{voteTitle}, #{deadline}, #{vote1ST}, #{vote2ND}, #{uploadPath}, #{upload1st}, #{upload2nd}, #{upload1stOrigin}, #{upload2ndOrigin}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE P_IDX = #{idx} AND P_DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND P_STATUS = 'A'
SELECT * FROM "COMMENT" WHERE C_DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND P_IDX = #{idx} ORDER BY c_create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "COMMENT"(c_idx, p_idx, m_idx, c_content, c_create_date) VALUES(c_idx_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{postIdx}, #{memIdx}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO VOTE(v_idx, p_idx, m_idx, v_select) VALUES(v_idx_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{postIdx}, #{memIdx}, #{seleted})
